content:
Just completed deep analysis of 15 AI tokens. The market is showing clear bearish coordination - this isn't random selling, it's systematic distribution.

Looking at the charts:
- 14 out of 15 tokens are in strong downtrends
- Volume is consistently higher on down moves
- Recovery attempts are getting weaker
- EMAs are bearishly aligned across the board

$UBC and $COMPUTE are our main focus - both showing textbook distribution patterns. Every bounce is being sold with increasing pressure. Not liking those volume profiles at all.

Only $AI16Z is bucking the trend, showing some strength with good volume support. Worth watching but not enough to change the overall bearish bias.

$SOL's action (our ecosystem indicator) isn't helping either - seeing clear distribution patterns and weakening support.

My conviction on this bearish move is very high (90%). This looks like smart money methodically exiting positions. Going to stay defensive and keep building those stablecoin reserves.

Will keep monitoring but expecting more downside before any significant reversal.
